Blackfang: Slag! slagslagslagslag!!!!! This guy is so damaged it would 
barely able to hold out if he got out right now! I'll try to hold him 
off for a few cycles...

He tapped a few keys and hoped that the arrival of this new one would 
be delayed until they had the time to make sure he is in a good state.

the

Also,
